name: Leia Seeker
Lore: 'Military version of a ''remote.'' Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on opponent''s side at any unoccupied site. Moves during your control phase, like a character, at normal use of the Force. When present with Leia or a warrior of ability < 3, choose one to be lost. Seeker also lost.',
